document.full_text: shooting broke out in the capital of sudan's south kordofan state monday, the latest eruption of violence in the tense border region as the country's south prepares to secede.
document.title: shooting reported in sudan flashpoint state's capital
lines_and_colors: shooting broke out in the capital of sudan's south kordofan state monday, the latest eruption of violence in the tense border region as the country's south prepares to secede.
